contents.zh-CHS: 如果任何属性在更新消息中出现多次，则必须将错误子代码设置为格式不正确的属性列表。

contents.text: The NLRI field in the UPDATE message is checked for syntactic validity. If the field is syntactically incorrect, then the Error Subcode MUST be set to Invalid Network Field.
contents.zh-CHS: 检查更新消息中的NLRI字段的语法有效性。如果字段语法不正确，则必须将错误子代码设置为无效网络字段。

contents.text: If a prefix in the NLRI field is semantically incorrect (e.g., an unexpected multicast IP address), an error SHOULD be logged locally, and the prefix SHOULD be ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果NLRI字段中的前缀在语义上不正确（例如，意外的多播IP地址），则应在本地记录错误，并且应忽略前缀。

contents.text: An UPDATE message that contains correct path attributes, but no NLRI, SHALL be treated as a valid UPDATE message.
contents.zh-CHS: 包含正确路径属性但没有NLRI的更新消息应视为有效的更新消息。

contents.text: 6.4. NOTIFICATION Message Error Handling
contents.zh-CHS: 6.4. 通知消息错误处理

contents.text: If a peer sends a NOTIFICATION message, and the receiver of the message detects an error in that message, the receiver cannot use a NOTIFICATION message to report this error back to the peer. Any such error (e.g., an unrecognized Error Code or Error Subcode) SHOULD be noticed, logged locally, and brought to the attention of the administration of the peer. The means to do this, however, lies outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果对等方发送通知消息，且消息接收方检测到该消息中存在错误，则接收方无法使用通知消息将此错误报告回对等方。应注意任何此类错误（例如，无法识别的错误代码或错误子代码），在本地记录，并提请对等方管理部门注意。然而，这样做的方法不在本文件的范围之内。

contents.text: 6.5. Hold Timer Expired Error Handling
contents.zh-CHS: 6.5. 保持计时器过期错误处理

contents.text: If a system does not receive successive KEEPALIVE, UPDATE, and/or NOTIFICATION messages within the period specified in the Hold Time field of the OPEN message, then the NOTIFICATION message with the Hold Timer Expired Error Code is sent and the BGP connection is closed.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果系统在打开消息的保持时间字段中指定的时间段内未接收到连续的KEEPALIVE、UPDATE和/或通知消息，则发送带有保持计时器过期错误代码的通知消息，并关闭BGP连接。

contents.text: 6.6. Finite State Machine Error Handling
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6. 有限状态机错误处理

contents.text: Any error detected by the BGP Finite State Machine (e.g., receipt of an unexpected event) is indicated by sending the NOTIFICATION message with the Error Code Finite State Machine Error.
contents.zh-CHS: BGP有限状态机检测到的任何错误（例如，收到意外事件）通过发送带有错误代码有限状态机错误的通知消息来指示。

contents.text: 6.7. Cease

In the absence of any fatal errors (that are indicated in this section), a BGP peer MAY choose, at any given time, to close its BGP connection by sending the NOTIFICATION message with the Error Code Cease. However, the Cease NOTIFICATION message MUST NOT be used when a fatal error indicated by this section does exist.
contents.zh-CHS: 在没有任何致命错误（本节中指出）的情况下，BGP对等方可以在任何给定时间通过发送带有错误代码STOP的通知消息来选择关闭其BGP连接。但是，当本节指示的致命错误确实存在时，不得使用停止通知消息。

contents.text: A BGP speaker MAY support the ability to impose a locally-configured, upper bound on the number of address prefixes the speaker is willing to accept from a neighbor. When the upper bound is reached, the speaker, under control of local configuration, either (a) discards new address prefixes from the neighbor (while maintaining the BGP connection with the neighbor), or (b) terminates the BGP connection with the neighbor. If the BGP speaker decides to terminate its BGP connection with a neighbor because the number of address prefixes received from the neighbor exceeds the locally-configured, upper bound, then the speaker MUST send the neighbor a NOTIFICATION message with the Error Code Cease. The speaker MAY also log this locally.
contents.zh-CHS: BGP演讲者可以支持对演讲者愿意从邻居接受的地址前缀的数量施加本地配置的上限的能力。当达到上限时，说话人在本地配置的控制下，（a）丢弃邻居的新地址前缀（同时保持与邻居的BGP连接），或（b）终止与邻居的BGP连接。如果BGP演讲者决定终止其与邻居的BGP连接，因为从邻居接收的地址前缀数量超过了本地配置的上限，则演讲者必须向邻居发送带有错误代码STOP的通知消息。演讲者也可以将此记录在本地。

contents.text: 6.8. BGP Connection Collision Detection
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8. BGP连接冲突检测

contents.text: If a pair of BGP speakers try to establish a BGP connection with each other simultaneously, then two parallel connections well be formed. If the source IP address used by one of these connections is the same as the destination IP address used by the other, and the destination IP address used by the first connection is the same as the source IP address used by the other, connection collision has occurred. In the event of connection collision, one of the connections MUST be closed.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果一对BGP扬声器试图同时彼此建立BGP连接，则很可能形成两个并行连接。如果其中一个连接使用的源IP地址与另一个连接使用的目标IP地址相同，并且第一个连接使用的目标IP地址与另一个连接使用的源IP地址相同，则会发生连接冲突。在连接冲突的情况下，必须关闭其中一个连接。

contents.text: Based on the value of the BGP Identifier, a convention is established for detecting which BGP connection is to be preserved when a collision occurs. The convention is to compare the BGP Identifiers of the peers involved in the collision and to retain only the connection initiated by the BGP speaker with the higher-valued BGP Identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 基于BGP标识符的值，建立了一种约定，用于在发生冲突时检测要保留的BGP连接。该约定是比较参与冲突的对等方的BGP标识符，并仅保留由BGP说话人启动的连接与更高值的BGP标识符。

contents.text: Upon receipt of an OPEN message, the local system MUST examine all of its connections that are in the OpenConfirm state. A BGP speaker MAY also examine connections in an OpenSent state if it knows the BGP Identifier of the peer by means outside of the protocol. If, among these connections, there is a connection to a remote BGP speaker
contents.zh-CHS: 收到打开的消息后，本地系统必须检查所有处于OpenConfirm状态的连接。如果BGP说话者通过协议之外的方式知道对等方的BGP标识符，则也可以在OpenSent状态下检查连接。如果在这些连接中，存在到远程BGP扬声器的连接

contents.text: whose BGP Identifier equals the one in the OPEN message, and this connection collides with the connection over which the OPEN message is received, then the local system performs the following collision resolution procedure:
contents.zh-CHS: 其BGP标识符等于打开消息中的BGP标识符，并且此连接与接收打开消息的连接冲突，则本地系统执行以下冲突解决过程：

contents.text: 1) The BGP Identifier of the local system is compared to the BGP Identifier of the remote system (as specified in the OPEN message). Comparing BGP Identifiers is done by converting them to host byte order and treating them as 4-octet unsigned integers.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 将本地系统的BGP标识符与远程系统的BGP标识符进行比较（如打开消息中所指定）。比较BGP标识符的方法是将它们转换为主机字节顺序，并将它们视为4个八位无符号整数。

contents.text: 2) If the value of the local BGP Identifier is less than the remote one, the local system closes the BGP connection that already exists (the one that is already in the OpenConfirm state), and accepts the BGP connection initiated by the remote system.
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 如果本地BGP标识符的值小于远程BGP标识符的值，则本地系统关闭已存在的BGP连接（已处于OpenConfirm状态的BGP连接），并接受远程系统启动的BGP连接。

contents.text: 3) Otherwise, the local system closes the newly created BGP connection (the one associated with the newly received OPEN message), and continues to use the existing one (the one that is already in the OpenConfirm state).
contents.zh-CHS: 3) 否则，本地系统将关闭新创建的BGP连接（与新接收到的打开消息相关联的连接），并继续使用现有连接（已处于OpenConfirm状态的连接）。

contents.text: Unless allowed via configuration, a connection collision with an existing BGP connection that is in the Established state causes closing of the newly created connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 除非通过配置允许，否则与处于已建立状态的现有BGP连接的连接冲突将导致关闭新创建的连接。

contents.text: Note that a connection collision cannot be detected with connections that are in Idle, Connect, or Active states.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，对于处于空闲、连接或活动状态的连接，无法检测到连接冲突。

contents.text: Closing the BGP connection (that results from the collision resolution procedure) is accomplished by sending the NOTIFICATION message with the Error Code Cease.
contents.zh-CHS: 关闭BGP连接（由冲突解决过程产生）是通过发送带有错误代码STOP的通知消息来完成的。

contents.text: 7. BGP Version Negotiation
contents.zh-CHS: 7. BGP版本协商

contents.text: BGP speakers MAY negotiate the version of the protocol by making multiple attempts at opening a BGP connection, starting with the highest version number each BGP speaker supports. If an open attempt fails with an Error Code, OPEN Message Error, and an Error Subcode, Unsupported Version Number, then the BGP speaker has available the version number it tried, the version number its peer tried, the version number passed by its peer in the NOTIFICATION message, and the version numbers it supports. If the two peers do support one or more common versions, then this will allow them to rapidly determine the highest common version. In order to support BGP version negotiation, future versions of BGP MUST retain the format of the OPEN and NOTIFICATION messages.
contents.zh-CHS: BGP扬声器可以通过多次尝试打开BGP连接来协商协议的版本，从每个BGP扬声器支持的最高版本号开始。如果打开尝试失败，出现错误代码、打开消息错误和错误子代码、不受支持的版本号，则BGP扬声器已提供其尝试的版本号、其对等方尝试的版本号、其对等方在通知消息中传递的版本号以及其支持的版本号。如果两个对等点确实支持一个或多个通用版本，那么这将允许它们快速确定最高的通用版本。为了支持BGP版本协商，BGP的未来版本必须保留打开和通知消息的格式。

contents.text: 8. BGP Finite State Machine (FSM)
contents.zh-CHS: 8. BGP有限状态机（FSM）

contents.text: The data structures and FSM described in this document are conceptual and do not have to be implemented precisely as described here, as long as the implementations support the described functionality and they exhibit the same externally visible behavior.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档中描述的数据结构和FSM是概念性的，不必像这里描述的那样精确地实现，只要实现支持所描述的功能，并且它们表现出相同的外部可见行为。

contents.text: This section specifies the BGP operation in terms of a Finite State Machine (FSM). The section falls into two parts:
contents.zh-CHS: 本节根据有限状态机（FSM）指定BGP操作。本节分为两部分：

contents.text: 1) Description of Events for the State machine (Section 8.1) 2) Description of the FSM (Section 8.2)
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 状态机事件描述（第8.1节）2）FSM描述（第8.2节）

contents.text: Session attributes required (mandatory) for each connection are:
contents.zh-CHS: 每个连接所需（必需）的会话属性包括：

contents.text: 1) State 2) ConnectRetryCounter 3) ConnectRetryTimer 4) ConnectRetryTime 5) HoldTimer 6) HoldTime 7) KeepaliveTimer 8) KeepaliveTime
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 状态2）ConnectRetryCounter 3）ConnectRetryTimer 4）ConnectRetryTime 5）HoldTimer 6）HoldTime 7）KeepaliveTimer 8）KeepaliveTime

contents.text: The state session attribute indicates the current state of the BGP FSM. The ConnectRetryCounter indicates the number of times a BGP peer has tried to establish a peer session.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态会话属性表示BGP FSM的当前状态。ConnectRetryCounter指示BGP对等方尝试建立对等会话的次数。

contents.text: The mandatory attributes related to timers are described in Section 10. Each timer has a "timer" and a "time" (the initial value).
contents.zh-CHS: 第10节描述了与定时器相关的强制性属性。每个计时器都有一个“计时器”和一个“时间”（初始值）。

contents.text: The optional Session attributes are listed below. These optional attributes may be supported, either per connection or per local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 下面列出了可选会话属性。每个连接或每个本地系统都可能支持以下可选属性：

contents.text: 1) AcceptConnectionsUnconfiguredPeers 2) AllowAutomaticStart 3) AllowAutomaticStop 4) CollisionDetectEstablishedState 5) DampPeerOscillations 6) DelayOpen 7) DelayOpenTime 8) DelayOpenTimer 9) IdleHoldTime 10) IdleHoldTimer 11) PassiveTcpEstablishment 12) SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN 13) TrackTcpState
contents.zh-CHS: 1） AcceptConnections Unconfigured Peers 2）AllowAutomaticStart 3）AllowAutomaticStop 4）碰撞检测测试数据状态5）阻尼对等关系6）延迟打开7）延迟打开时间8）延迟打开计时器9）空闲保持时间10）空闲保持计时器11）无源CPE建立12）发送通知而不打开跟踪TCPState

contents.text: The optional session attributes support different features of the BGP functionality that have implications for the BGP FSM state transitions. Two groups of the attributes which relate to timers are:
contents.zh-CHS: 可选会话属性支持对BGP FSM状态转换有影响的BGP功能的不同功能。与计时器相关的两组属性是：

contents.text: group 1: DelayOpen, DelayOpenTime, DelayOpenTimer group 2: DampPeerOscillations, IdleHoldTime, IdleHoldTimer
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：延迟打开、延迟打开时间、延迟打开计时器第2组：阻尼隔离、IdleHoldTime、IdleHoldTimer

contents.text: The first parameter (DelayOpen, DampPeerOscillations) is an optional attribute that indicates that the Timer function is active. The "Time" value specifies the initial value for the "Timer" (DelayOpenTime, IdleHoldTime). The "Timer" specifies the actual timer.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一个参数（DelayOpen，DampPeerOscillations）是一个可选属性，指示计时器功能处于活动状态。“时间”值指定“计时器”（DelayOpenTime、IdleHoldTime）的初始值。“计时器”指定实际计时器。

contents.text: Please refer to Section 8.1.1 for an explanation of the interaction between these optional attributes and the events signaled to the state machine. Section 8.2.1.3 also provides a short overview of the different types of optional attributes (flags or timers).
contents.zh-CHS: 请参阅第8.1.1节，以了解这些可选属性与向状态机发送信号的事件之间的交互说明。第8.2.1.3节还简要概述了不同类型的可选属性（标志或计时器）。

contents.text: 8.1. Events for the BGP FSM
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1. BGP FSM的事件

contents.text: 8.1.1. Optional Events Linked to Optional Session Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1.1. 链接到可选会话属性的可选事件

contents.text: The Inputs to the BGP FSM are events. Events can either be mandatory or optional. Some optional events are linked to optional session attributes. Optional session attributes enable several groups of FSM functionality.
contents.zh-CHS: BGP FSM的输入为事件。事件可以是强制性的，也可以是可选的。某些可选事件链接到可选会话属性。可选会话属性支持多组FSM功能。

contents.text: The linkage between FSM functionality, events, and the optional session attributes are described below.
contents.zh-CHS: FSM功能、事件和可选会话属性之间的链接如下所述。

contents.text: Group 1: Automatic Administrative Events (Start/Stop)
contents.zh-CHS: 组1：自动管理事件（启动/停止）

contents.text: Optional Session Attributes: AllowAutomaticStart, AllowAutomaticStop, DampPeerOscillations, IdleHoldTime, IdleHoldTimer
contents.zh-CHS: 可选会话属性：AllowAutomaticStart、AllowAutomaticStop、DampPeerOscillations、IdleHoldTime、IdleHoldTimer

contents.text: Option 1: AllowAutomaticStart
contents.zh-CHS: 选项1：AllowAutomaticStart

contents.text: Description: A BGP peer connection can be started and stopped by administrative control. This administrative control can either be manual, based on operator intervention, or under the control of logic that is specific to a BGP implementation. The term "automatic" refers to a start being issued to the BGP peer connection FSM when such logic determines that the BGP peer connection should be restarted.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：管理控制可以启动和停止BGP对等连接。该管理控制可以是基于操作员干预的手动控制，也可以是特定于BGP实现的逻辑控制。术语“自动”是指当此类逻辑确定BGP对等连接应重新启动时，向BGP对等连接FSM发出的启动。

contents.text: The AllowAutomaticStart attribute specifies that this BGP connection supports automatic starting of the BGP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: AllowAutomaticStart属性指定此BGP连接支持自动启动BGP连接。

contents.text: If the BGP implementation supports AllowAutomaticStart, the peer may be repeatedly restarted. Three other options control the rate at which the automatic restart occurs: DampPeerOscillations, IdleHoldTime, and the IdleHoldTimer.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果BGP实现支持AllowAutomaticStart，则对等机可能会重复重启。其他三个选项控制自动重启发生的速率：DampPeerOscillations、IdleHoldTime和IdleHoldTimer。

contents.text: The DampPeerOscillations option specifies that the implementation engages additional logic to damp the oscillations of BGP peers in the face of sequences of automatic start and automatic stop. IdleHoldTime specifies the length of time the BGP peer is held in the Idle state prior to allowing the next automatic restart. The IdleHoldTimer is the timer that holds the peer in Idle state.
contents.zh-CHS: DampPeerOscillations选项指定，在自动启动和自动停止序列面前，该实现采用额外的逻辑来抑制BGP对等点的振荡。IdleHoldTime指定在允许下一次自动重启之前，BGP对等机处于空闲状态的时间长度。IdleHoldTimer是将对等方保持在空闲状态的计时器。

contents.text: An example of DampPeerOscillations logic is an increase of the IdleHoldTime value if a BGP peer oscillates connectivity (connected/disconnected) repeatedly within a time period. To engage this logic, a peer could connect and disconnect 10 times within 5 minutes. The IdleHoldTime value would be reset from 0 to 120 seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: DampPeerOscillations逻辑的一个示例是，如果BGP对等方在一个时间段内反复振荡连接（连接/断开），IdleHoldTime值将增加。要采用这种逻辑，对等方可以在5分钟内连接和断开10次。IdleHoldTime值将从0重置为120秒。

contents.text: Values: TRUE or FALSE
contents.zh-CHS: 值：真还是假

contents.text: Option 2: AllowAutomaticStop
contents.zh-CHS: 选项2：AllowAutomaticStop

contents.text: Description: This BGP peer session optional attribute indicates that the BGP connection allows "automatic" stopping of the BGP connection. An "automatic" stop is defined as a stop under the control of implementation-specific logic. The implementation-specific logic is outside the scope of this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：此BGP对等会话可选属性表示BGP连接允许“自动”停止BGP连接。“自动”停止被定义为在特定于实现的逻辑控制下的停止。特定于实现的逻辑不在本规范的范围内。

contents.text: Values: TRUE or FALSE
contents.zh-CHS: 值：真还是假

contents.text: Option 3: DampPeerOscillations
contents.zh-CHS: 备选方案3：湿剥离

contents.text: Description: The DampPeerOscillations optional session attribute indicates that the BGP connection is using logic that damps BGP peer oscillations in the Idle State.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：DampPeerOscillations可选会话属性表示BGP连接正在使用逻辑抑制处于空闲状态的BGP对等振荡。

contents.text: Value: TRUE or FALSE
contents.zh-CHS: 值：对还是错

contents.text: Option 4: IdleHoldTime
contents.zh-CHS: 选项4：闲置时间

contents.text: Description: The IdleHoldTime is the value that is set in the IdleHoldTimer.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：IdleHoldTime是在IdleHoldTimer中设置的值。

contents.text: Values: Time in seconds
contents.zh-CHS: 值：以秒为单位的时间

contents.text: Option 5: IdleHoldTimer
contents.zh-CHS: 选项5：IdleHoldTimer

contents.text: Description: The IdleHoldTimer aids in controlling BGP peer oscillation. The IdleHoldTimer is used to keep the BGP peer in Idle for a particular duration. The IdleHoldTimer_Expires event is described in Section 8.1.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：IdleHoldTimer有助于控制BGP对等振荡。IdleHoldTimer用于在特定的持续时间内保持BGP对等机处于空闲状态。IdleHoldTimer_Expires事件在第8.1.3节中描述。

contents.text: Values: Time in seconds
contents.zh-CHS: 值：以秒为单位的时间

contents.text: Group 2: Unconfigured Peers
contents.zh-CHS: 第2组：未配置的对等方

contents.text: Optional Session Attributes: AcceptConnectionsUnconfiguredPeers
Option 1:    AcceptConnectionsUnconfiguredPeers

Description: The BGP FSM optionally allows the acceptance of BGP peer connections from neighbors that are not pre-configured. The "AcceptConnectionsUnconfiguredPeers" optional session attribute allows the FSM to support the state transitions that allow the implementation to accept or reject these unconfigured peers.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：BGP FSM可选地允许接受来自未预先配置的邻居的BGP对等连接。“AcceptConnectionsUnconfiguredPeers”可选会话属性允许FSM支持允许实现接受或拒绝这些未配置对等点的状态转换。

contents.text: The AcceptConnectionsUnconfiguredPeers has security implications. Please refer to the BGP Vulnerabilities document [RFC4272] for details.
contents.zh-CHS: AcceptConnectionsUnconfiguredPeers具有安全隐患。有关详细信息，请参阅BGP漏洞文档[RFC4272]。

contents.text: Value: True or False
contents.zh-CHS: 值：对还是错

contents.text: Group 3: TCP processing
contents.zh-CHS: 第3组：TCP处理

contents.text: Optional Session Attributes: PassiveTcpEstablishment, TrackTcpState
contents.zh-CHS: 可选会话属性：被动设置、TrackTcpState

contents.text: Option 1: PassiveTcpEstablishment
contents.zh-CHS: 备选方案1：被动建立

contents.text: Description: This option indicates that the BGP FSM will passively wait for the remote BGP peer to establish the BGP TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：此选项表示BGP FSM将被动等待远程BGP对等方建立BGP TCP连接。

contents.text: value: TRUE or FALSE
contents.zh-CHS: 值：对还是错

contents.text: Option 2: TrackTcpState
contents.zh-CHS: 选项2：TrackTcpState

contents.text: Description: The BGP FSM normally tracks the end result of a TCP connection attempt rather than individual TCP messages. Optionally, the BGP FSM can support additional interaction with the TCP connection negotiation. The interaction with the TCP events may increase the amount of logging the BGP peer connection requires and the number of BGP FSM changes.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：BGP FSM通常跟踪TCP连接尝试的最终结果，而不是单个TCP消息。可选地，BGP FSM可以支持与TCP连接协商的额外交互。与TCP事件的交互可能会增加BGP对等连接所需的日志记录量和BGP FSM更改的数量。

contents.text: Value: TRUE or FALSE
contents.zh-CHS: 值：对还是错

contents.text: Group 4: BGP Message Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 第4组：BGP消息处理

contents.text: Optional Session Attributes: DelayOpen, DelayOpenTime, DelayOpenTimer, SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN, CollisionDetectEstablishedState
contents.zh-CHS: 可选会话属性：DelayOpen、DelayOpenTime、DelayOpenTimer、SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN、CollisionDetectedTestAblishedState

contents.text: Option 1: DelayOpen
contents.zh-CHS: 选项1：延迟开放

contents.text: Description: The DelayOpen optional session attribute allows implementations to be configured to delay sending an OPEN message for a specific time period (DelayOpenTime). The delay allows the remote BGP Peer time to send the first OPEN message.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：DelayOpen可选会话属性允许将实现配置为在特定时间段（DelayOpenTime）内延迟发送打开的消息。延迟允许远程BGP对等方有时间发送第一条打开的消息。

contents.text: Value: TRUE or FALSE
contents.zh-CHS: 值：对还是错

contents.text: Option 2: DelayOpenTime
contents.zh-CHS: 选项2：延迟开放时间

contents.text: Description: The DelayOpenTime is the initial value set in the DelayOpenTimer.
contents.zh-CHS: 说明：DelayOpenTime是DelayOpenTimer中设置的初始值。

contents.text: Value: Time in seconds
contents.zh-CHS: 值：以秒为单位的时间

contents.text: Option 3: DelayOpenTimer
contents.zh-CHS: 选项3：延迟开放计时器

contents.text: Description: The DelayOpenTimer optional session attribute is used to delay the sending of an OPEN message on a
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：DelayOpenTimer可选会话属性用于延迟服务器上打开消息的发送

contents.text: connection. The DelayOpenTimer_Expires event (Event 12) is described in Section 8.1.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 联系第8.1.3节描述了DelayOpenTimer_Expires事件（事件12）。

contents.text: Value: Time in seconds
contents.zh-CHS: 值：以秒为单位的时间

contents.text: Option 4: SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN
contents.zh-CHS: 选项4:SendNotificationWithout打开

contents.text: Description: The SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN allows a peer to send a NOTIFICATION without first sending an OPEN message. Without this optional session attribute, the BGP connection assumes that an OPEN message must be sent by a peer prior to the peer sending a NOTIFICATION message.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN允许对等方发送通知，而无需先发送打开的消息。如果没有此可选会话属性，BGP连接将假定在对等方发送通知消息之前，必须先由对等方发送打开的消息。

contents.text: Value: True or False
contents.zh-CHS: 值：对还是错

contents.text: Option 5: CollisionDetectEstablishedState
contents.zh-CHS: 选项5：碰撞检测测试状态

contents.text: Description: Normally, a Detect Collision (see Section 6.8) will be ignored in the Established state. This optional session attribute indicates that this BGP connection processes collisions in the Established state.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：通常，在已建立状态下，检测碰撞（见第6.8节）将被忽略。此可选会话属性表示此BGP连接在已建立状态下处理冲突。

contents.text: Value: True or False
contents.zh-CHS: 值：对还是错

contents.text: Note: The optional session attributes clarify the BGP FSM description for existing features of BGP implementations. The optional session attributes may be pre-defined for an implementation and not readable via management interfaces for existing correct implementations. As newer BGP MIBs (version 2 and beyond) are supported, these fields will be accessible via a management interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：可选会话属性澄清了BGP FSM对BGP实现现有功能的描述。可选会话属性可能是为实现预定义的，并且对于现有的正确实现，无法通过管理接口读取。由于支持较新的BGP MIB（版本2及更高版本），因此可以通过管理界面访问这些字段。

contents.text: 8.1.2. Administrative Events
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1.2. 管理事件

contents.text: An administrative event is an event in which the operator interface and BGP Policy engine signal the BGP-finite state machine to start or stop the BGP state machine. The basic start and stop indications are augmented by optional connection attributes that signal a certain type of start or stop mechanism to the BGP FSM. An example of this combination is Event 5, AutomaticStart_with_PassiveTcpEstablishment. With this event, the BGP implementation signals to the BGP FSM that the implementation is using an Automatic Start with the option to use a Passive TCP Establishment. The Passive TCP establishment signals that this BGP FSM will wait for the remote side to start the TCP establishment.
contents.zh-CHS: 管理事件是操作员界面和BGP策略引擎向BGP有限状态机发出启动或停止BGP状态机的信号的事件。基本启动和停止指示通过可选连接属性进行增强，这些属性向BGP FSM发送特定类型启动或停止机制的信号。这种组合的一个例子是事件5，AutomaticStart_与_被动设置。在该事件中，BGP实现向BGP FSM发出信号，表示该实现正在使用自动启动，并选择使用被动TCP建立。被动TCP建立表示此BGP FSM将等待远程端启动TCP建立。

contents.text: Note that only Event 1 (ManualStart) and Event 2 (ManualStop) are mandatory administrative events. All other administrative events are optional (Events 3-8). Each event below has a name, definition, status (mandatory or optional), and the optional session attributes that SHOULD be set at each stage. When generating Event 1 through Event 8 for the BGP FSM, the conditions specified in the "Optional Attribute Status" section are verified. If any of these conditions are not satisfied, then the local system should log an FSM error.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，只有事件1（手动启动）和事件2（手动停止）是强制性管理事件。所有其他管理事件都是可选的（事件3-8）。下面的每个事件都有名称、定义、状态（强制或可选）以及每个阶段应设置的可选会话属性。为BGP FSM生成事件1至事件8时，验证“可选属性状态”部分中指定的条件。如果不满足上述任何条件，则本地系统应记录FSM错误。

contents.text: The settings of optional session attributes may be implicit in some implementations, and therefore may not be set explicitly by an external operator action. Section 8.2.1.5 describes these implicit settings of the optional session attributes. The administrative states described below may also be implicit in some implementations and not directly configurable by an external operator.
contents.zh-CHS: The settings of optional session attributes may be implicit in some implementations, and therefore may not be set explicitly by an external operator action. Section 8.2.1.5 describes these implicit settings of the optional session attributes. contents.text: 8.2. Description of FSM
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2. FSM说明

contents.text: 8.2.1. FSM Definition
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.1. FSM定义

contents.text: BGP MUST maintain a separate FSM for each configured peer. Each BGP peer paired in a potential connection will attempt to connect to the other, unless configured to remain in the idle state, or configured to remain passive. For the purpose of this discussion, the active or connecting side of the TCP connection (the side of a TCP connection sending the first TCP SYN packet) is called outgoing. The passive or listening side (the sender of the first SYN/ACK) is called an incoming connection. (See Section 8.2.1.1 for information on the terms active and passive used below.)
contents.zh-CHS: BGP必须为每个配置的对等机维护一个单独的FSM。在潜在连接中配对的每个BGP对等方将尝试连接到另一个，除非配置为保持空闲状态或配置为保持被动。在本讨论中，TCP连接的活动或连接端（发送第一个TCP SYN数据包的TCP连接端）称为传出。被动或侦听端（第一个SYN/ACK的发送方）称为传入连接。（关于下文使用的术语主动和被动，请参见第8.2.1.1节。）

contents.text: A BGP implementation MUST connect to and listen on TCP port 179 for incoming connections in addition to trying to connect to peers. For each incoming connection, a state machine MUST be instantiated. There exists a period in which the identity of the peer on the other end of an incoming connection is known, but the BGP identifier is not known. During this time, both an incoming and outgoing connection may exist for the same configured peering. This is referred to as a connection collision (see Section 6.8).
contents.zh-CHS: 除了尝试连接到对等方之外，BGP实现还必须连接到TCP端口179并在其上侦听传入连接。对于每个传入连接，必须实例化一个状态机。存在一段时间，在此期间，传入连接另一端的对等方的标识已知，但BGP标识符未知。在此期间，同一配置的对等可能存在传入和传出连接。这称为连接冲突（见第6.8节）。

contents.text: A BGP implementation will have, at most, one FSM for each configured peering, plus one FSM for each incoming TCP connection for which the peer has not yet been identified. Each FSM corresponds to exactly one TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: BGP实现最多为每个配置的对等点配置一个FSM，为每个尚未识别对等点的传入TCP连接添加一个FSM。每个FSM只对应一个TCP连接。

contents.text: There may be more than one connection between a pair of peers if the connections are configured to use a different pair of IP addresses. This is referred to as multiple "configured peerings" to the same peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果将连接配置为使用不同的一对IP地址，则一对对等方之间可能存在多个连接。这被称为同一对等方的多个“配置对等”。

contents.text: 8.2.1.1. Terms "active" and "passive"

The terms active and passive have been in the Internet operator's vocabulary for almost a decade and have proven useful. The words active and passive have slightly different meanings when applied to a TCP connection or a peer. There is only one active side and one passive side to any one TCP connection, per the definition above and the state machine below. When a BGP speaker is configured as active, it may end up on either the active or passive side of the connection that eventually gets established. Once the TCP connection is completed, it doesn't matter which end was active and which was passive. The only difference is in which side of the TCP connection has port number 179.
contents.zh-CHS: “主动”和“被动”这两个术语在互联网运营商的词汇表中已经存在了近十年，并被证明是有用的。“主动”和“被动”这两个词在用于TCP连接或对等连接时的含义略有不同。根据上面的定义和下面的状态机，任何一个TCP连接只有一个主动端和一个被动端。当BGP扬声器配置为有源时，它可能会在最终建立的连接的有源或无源侧结束。一旦TCP连接完成，哪一端是主动端，哪一端是被动端就无关紧要了。唯一的区别在于TCP连接的哪一侧具有端口号179。

contents.text: 8.2.1.2. FSM and Collision Detection
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.1.2. 有限状态机与碰撞检测

contents.text: There is one FSM per BGP connection. When the connection collision occurs prior to determining what peer a connection is associated with, there may be two connections for one peer. After the connection collision is resolved (see Section 6.8), the FSM for the connection that is closed SHOULD be disposed.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个BGP连接有一个FSM。当连接冲突发生在确定连接与哪个对等方关联之前时，一个对等方可能有两个连接。解决连接冲突后（参见第6.8节），应处理关闭连接的FSM。

contents.text: 8.2.1.3. FSM and Optional Session Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.1.3. FSM和可选会话属性

contents.text: Optional Session Attributes specify either attributes that act as flags (TRUE or FALSE) or optional timers. For optional attributes that act as flags, if the optional session attribute can be set to TRUE on the system, the corresponding BGP FSM actions must be supported. For example, if the following options can be set in a BGP implementation: AutoStart and PassiveTcpEstablishment, then Events 3, 4 and 5 must be supported. If an Optional Session attribute cannot be set to TRUE, the events supporting that set of options do not have to be supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 可选会话属性指定用作标志（TRUE或FALSE）的属性或可选计时器。对于用作标志的可选属性，如果系统上的可选会话属性可以设置为TRUE，则必须支持相应的BGP FSM操作。例如，如果可以在BGP实现中设置以下选项：AutoStart和PassivetCPEstablish，则必须支持事件3、4和5。如果可选会话属性不能设置为TRUE，则不必支持支持该选项集的事件。

contents.text: Each of the optional timers (DelayOpenTimer and IdleHoldTimer) has a group of attributes that are:
contents.zh-CHS: 每个可选计时器（DelayOpenTimer和IdleHoldTimer）都有一组属性，这些属性是：

contents.text: - flag indicating support, - Time set in Timer - Timer.
contents.zh-CHS: - 表示支持的标志，-在定时器-定时器中设置的时间。

contents.text: The two optional timers show this format:
contents.zh-CHS: 两个可选计时器显示此格式：

contents.text: DelayOpenTimer: DelayOpen, DelayOpenTime, DelayOpenTimer IdleHoldTimer: DampPeerOscillations, IdleHoldTime, IdleHoldTimer
contents.zh-CHS: DelayOpenTimer:DelayOpen，DelayOpenTime，DelayOpenTimer IdleHoldTimer:DampPeerOscillations，IdleHoldTime，IdleHoldTimer

contents.text: If the flag indicating support for an optional timer (DelayOpen or DampPeerOscillations) cannot be set to TRUE, the timers and events supporting that option do not have to be supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果表示支持可选计时器（DelayOpen或DampPeerOscillations）的标志无法设置为TRUE，则不必支持支持该选项的计时器和事件。

contents.text: 8.2.1.4. FSM Event Numbers
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.1.4. FSM事件编号

contents.text: The Event numbers (1-28) utilized in this state machine description aid in specifying the behavior of the BGP state machine. Implementations MAY use these numbers to provide network management information. The exact form of an FSM or the FSM events are specific to each implementation.
contents.zh-CHS: 此状态机描述中使用的事件编号（1-28）有助于指定BGP状态机的行为。实现可以使用这些数字来提供网络管理信息。FSM或FSM事件的确切形式特定于每个实现。

contents.text: 8.2.1.5. FSM Actions that are Implementation Dependent
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.1.5. 依赖于实现的FSM操作

contents.text: At certain points, the BGP FSM specifies that BGP initialization will occur or that BGP resources will be deleted. The initialization of the BGP FSM and the associated resources depend on the policy portion of the BGP implementation. The details of these actions are outside the scope of the FSM document.
contents.zh-CHS: 在某些情况下，BGP FSM指定将进行BGP初始化或删除BGP资源。BGP FSM和相关资源的初始化取决于BGP实现的策略部分。这些行动的细节不在FSM文件的范围内。

contents.text: 8.2.2. Finite State Machine
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2.2. 有限状态机

contents.text: Idle state:
contents.zh-CHS: 空闲状态：

contents.text: Initially, the BGP peer FSM is in the Idle state. Hereafter, the BGP peer FSM will be shortened to BGP FSM.
contents.zh-CHS: 最初，BGP对等FSM处于空闲状态。此后，BGP对等FSM将缩短为BGP FSM。

contents.text: In this state, BGP FSM refuses all incoming BGP connections for this peer. No resources are allocated to the peer. In response to a ManualStart event (Event 1) or an AutomaticStart event (Event 3), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 在此状态下，BGP FSM拒绝此对等方的所有传入BGP连接。没有资源分配给对等方。为响应手动启动事件（事件1）或自动启动事件（事件3），本地系统：

contents.text: - initializes all BGP resources for the peer connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 初始化对等连接的所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - sets ConnectRetryCounter to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter设置为零，

contents.text: - starts the ConnectRetryTimer with the initial value,
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用初始值启动ConnectRetryTimer，

contents.text: - initiates a TCP connection to the other BGP peer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 启动与其他BGP对等方的TCP连接，

contents.text: - listens for a connection that may be initiated by the remote BGP peer, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 侦听远程BGP对等方可能发起的连接，以及

contents.text: - changes its state to Connect.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为“连接”。

contents.text: The ManualStop event (Event 2) and AutomaticStop (Event 8) event are ignored in the Idle state.
contents.zh-CHS: 在怠速状态下忽略手动停止事件（事件2）和自动停止（事件8）事件。

contents.text: In response to a ManualStart_with_PassiveTcpEstablishment event (Event 4) or AutomaticStart_with_PassiveTcpEstablishment event (Event 5), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应手动启动和被动设置事件（事件4）或自动启动和被动设置事件（事件5），本地系统：

contents.text: - initializes all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 初始化所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryCounter to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter设置为零，

contents.text: - starts the ConnectRetryTimer with the initial value,
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用初始值启动ConnectRetryTimer，

contents.text: - listens for a connection that may be initiated by the remote peer, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 侦听可能由远程对等方启动的连接，以及

contents.text: - changes its state to Active.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为“活动”。

contents.text: The exact value of the ConnectRetryTimer is a local matter, but it SHOULD be sufficiently large to allow TCP initialization.
contents.zh-CHS: ConnectRetryTimer的确切值是本地问题，但它应该足够大，以允许TCP初始化。

contents.text: If the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, the following three additional events may occur within the Idle state:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则在空闲状态下可能会发生以下三个附加事件：

contents.text: - AutomaticStart_with_DampPeerOscillations (Event 6),
contents.zh-CHS: - 自动启动带阻尼隔离装置（事件6），

contents.text: - AutomaticStart_with_DampPeerOscillations_and_ PassiveTcpEstablishment (Event 7),
contents.zh-CHS: - 自动启动，带有阻尼隔离和被动设置（事件7），

contents.text: - IdleHoldTimer_Expires (Event 13).
contents.zh-CHS: - IdleHoldTimer_过期（事件13）。

contents.text: Upon receiving these 3 events, the local system will use these events to prevent peer oscillations. The method of preventing persistent peer oscillation is outside the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 收到这3个事件后，本地系统将使用这些事件来防止对等振荡。防止持续对等振荡的方法不在本文档的范围内。

contents.text: Any other event (Events 9-12, 15-28) received in the Idle state does not cause change in the state of the local system.
contents.zh-CHS: 在空闲状态下接收的任何其他事件（事件9-12、15-28）不会导致本地系统的状态发生变化。

contents.text: Connect State:
contents.zh-CHS: 连接状态：

contents.text: In this state, BGP FSM is waiting for the TCP connection to be completed.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此状态下，BGP FSM正在等待TCP连接完成。

contents.text: The start events (Events 1, 3-7) are ignored in the Connect state.
contents.zh-CHS: 在连接状态下忽略启动事件（事件1、3-7）。

contents.text: In response to a ManualStop event (Event 2), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应手动停止事件（事件2），本地系统：

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - sets ConnectRetryCounter to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter设置为零，

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer and sets ConnectRetryTimer to zero, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: In response to the ConnectRetryTimer_Expires event (Event 9), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 响应ConnectRetryTimer_Expires事件（事件9），本地系统：

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - restarts the ConnectRetryTimer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 重新启动ConnectRetryTimer，

contents.text: - stops the DelayOpenTimer and resets the timer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止DelayOpenTimer并将计时器重置为零，

contents.text: - initiates a TCP connection to the other BGP peer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 启动与其他BGP对等方的TCP连接，

contents.text: - continues to listen for a connection that may be initiated by the remote BGP peer, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 继续侦听远程BGP对等方可能发起的连接，以及

contents.text: - stays in the Connect state.
contents.zh-CHS: - 保持连接状态。

contents.text: If the DelayOpenTimer_Expires event (Event 12) occurs in the Connect state, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在连接状态下发生DelayOpenTimer_Expires事件（事件12），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sends an OPEN message to its peer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 向其对等方发送打开的消息，

contents.text: - sets the HoldTimer to a large value, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将HoldTimer设置为较大的值，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to OpenSent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为OpenSent。

contents.text: If the BGP FSM receives a TcpConnection_Valid event (Event 14), the TCP connection is processed, and the connection remains in the Connect state.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果BGP FSM接收到TcpConnection_有效事件（事件14），则TCP连接将被处理，并且连接将保持在连接状态。

contents.text: If the BGP FSM receives a Tcp_CR_Invalid event (Event 15), the local system rejects the TCP connection, and the connection remains in the Connect state.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果BGP FSM接收到Tcp_CR_无效事件（事件15），本地系统将拒绝Tcp连接，并且该连接将保持连接状态。

contents.text: If the TCP connection succeeds (Event 16 or Event 17), the local system checks the DelayOpen attribute prior to processing. If the DelayOpen attribute is set to TRUE, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果TCP连接成功（事件16或事件17），本地系统将在处理之前检查DelayOpen属性。如果DelayOpen属性设置为TRUE，则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer (if running) and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer（如果正在运行）并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - sets the DelayOpenTimer to the initial value, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将DelayOpenTimer设置为初始值，然后

contents.text: - stays in the Connect state.
contents.zh-CHS: - 保持连接状态。

contents.text: If the DelayOpen attribute is set to FALSE, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DelayOpen属性设置为FALSE，则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer (if running) and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer（如果正在运行）并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - completes BGP initialization
contents.zh-CHS: - 完成BGP初始化

contents.text: - sends an OPEN message to its peer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 向其对等方发送打开的消息，

contents.text: - sets the HoldTimer to a large value, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将HoldTimer设置为较大的值，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to OpenSent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为OpenSent。

contents.text: A HoldTimer value of 4 minutes is suggested.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议将HoldTimer值设置为4分钟。

contents.text: If the TCP connection fails (Event 18), the local system checks the DelayOpenTimer. If the DelayOpenTimer is running, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果TCP连接失败（事件18），本地系统将检查DelayOpenTimer。如果DelayOpenTimer正在运行，则本地系统：

contents.text: - restarts the ConnectRetryTimer with the initial value,
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用初始值重新启动ConnectRetryTimer，

contents.text: - stops the DelayOpenTimer and resets its value to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止DelayOpenTimer并将其值重置为零，

contents.text: - continues to listen for a connection that may be initiated by the remote BGP peer, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 继续侦听远程BGP对等方可能发起的连接，以及

contents.text: - changes its state to Active.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为“活动”。

contents.text: If the DelayOpenTimer is not running, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DelayOpenTimer未运行，则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer停止为零，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，以及

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If an OPEN message is received while the DelayOpenTimer is running (Event 20), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在DelayOpenTimer运行时收到打开消息（事件20），则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer (if running) and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer（如果正在运行）并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - completes the BGP initialization,
contents.zh-CHS: - 完成BGP初始化，

contents.text: - stops and clears the DelayOpenTimer (sets the value to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止并清除DelayOpenTimer（将值设置为零），

contents.text: - sends an OPEN message,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送一条公开消息，

contents.text: - sends a KEEPALIVE message,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送一条KEEPALIVE消息，

contents.text: - if the HoldTimer initial value is non-zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果HoldTimer初始值为非零，

contents.text: - starts the KeepaliveTimer with the initial value and
contents.zh-CHS: - 使用初始值启动KeepaliveTimer，然后

contents.text: - resets the HoldTimer to the negotiated value,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将HoldTimer重置为协商值，

contents.text: else, if the HoldTimer initial value is zero,
contents.zh-CHS: 否则，如果HoldTimer初始值为零，

contents.text: - resets the KeepaliveTimer and
contents.zh-CHS: - 重置KeepaliveTimer和

contents.text: - resets the HoldTimer value to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将HoldTimer值重置为零，

contents.text: - and changes its state to OpenConfirm.
contents.zh-CHS: - 并将其状态更改为OpenConfirm。

contents.text: If the value of the autonomous system field is the same as the local Autonomous System number, set the connection status to an internal connection; otherwise it will be "external".
contents.zh-CHS: 如果自治系统字段的值与本地自治系统编号相同，则将连接状态设置为内部连接；否则它将是“外部的”。

contents.text: If BGP message header checking (Event 21) or OPEN message checking detects an error (Event 22) (see Section 6.2), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果BGP消息头检查（事件21）或打开消息检查检测到错误（事件22）（参见第6.2节），本地系统：

contents.text: - (optionally) If the SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN attribute is set to TRUE, then the local system first sends a NOTIFICATION message with the appropriate error code, and then
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN属性设置为TRUE，则本地系统首先发送带有相应错误代码的通知消息，然后

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer (if running) and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer（如果正在运行）并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If a NOTIFICATION message is received with a version error (Event 24), the local system checks the DelayOpenTimer. If the DelayOpenTimer is running, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到带有版本错误的通知消息（事件24），本地系统将检查DelayOpenTimer。如果DelayOpenTimer正在运行，则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer (if running) and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer（如果正在运行）并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - stops and resets the DelayOpenTimer (sets to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止并重置DelayOpenTimer（设置为零），

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the DelayOpenTimer is not running, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DelayOpenTimer未运行，则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to True, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为True，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: In response to any other events (Events 8, 10-11, 13, 19, 23, 25-28), the local system:
- if the ConnectRetryTimer is running, stops and resets the ConnectRetryTimer (sets to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果ConnectRetryTimer正在运行，则停止并重置ConnectRetryTimer（设置为零），

contents.text: - if the DelayOpenTimer is running, stops and resets the DelayOpenTimer (sets to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果DelayOpenTimer正在运行，则停止并重置DelayOpenTimer（设置为零），

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to True, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为True，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: Active State:
contents.zh-CHS: 活动状态：

contents.text: In this state, BGP FSM is trying to acquire a peer by listening for, and accepting, a TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此状态下，BGP FSM试图通过侦听和接受TCP连接来获取对等方。

contents.text: The start events (Events 1, 3-7) are ignored in the Active state.
contents.zh-CHS: 启动事件（事件1、3-7）在激活状态下被忽略。

contents.text: In response to a ManualStop event (Event 2), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应手动停止事件（事件2），本地系统：

contents.text: - If the DelayOpenTimer is running and the SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN session attribute is set, the local system sends a NOTIFICATION with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果DelayOpenTimer正在运行，并且设置了SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN会话属性，则本地系统将发送一个带有停止的通知，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources including stopping the DelayOpenTimer
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，包括停止DelayOpenTimer

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - sets ConnectRetryCounter to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter设置为零，

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: In response to a ConnectRetryTimer_Expires event (Event 9), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 响应ConnectRetryTimer_Expires事件（事件9），本地系统：

contents.text: - restarts the ConnectRetryTimer (with initial value),
contents.zh-CHS: - 重新启动ConnectRetryTimer（使用初始值），

contents.text: - initiates a TCP connection to the other BGP peer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 启动与其他BGP对等方的TCP连接，

contents.text: - continues to listen for a TCP connection that may be initiated by a remote BGP peer, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 继续侦听可能由远程BGP对等方启动的TCP连接，以及

contents.text: - changes its state to Connect.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为“连接”。

contents.text: If the local system receives a DelayOpenTimer_Expires event (Event 12), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统接收到DelayOpenTimer_Expires事件（事件12），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - stops and clears the DelayOpenTimer (set to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止并清除DelayOpenTimer（设置为零），

contents.text: - completes the BGP initialization,
contents.zh-CHS: - 完成BGP初始化，

contents.text: - sends the OPEN message to its remote peer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将打开的消息发送到其远程对等方，

contents.text: - sets its hold timer to a large value, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其保持计时器设置为大值，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to OpenSent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为OpenSent。

contents.text: A HoldTimer value of 4 minutes is also suggested for this state transition.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于此状态转换，建议使用4分钟的HoldTimer值。

contents.text: If the local system receives a TcpConnection_Valid event (Event 14), the local system processes the TCP connection flags and stays in the Active state.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统接收到TcpConnection_有效事件（事件14），本地系统将处理TCP连接标志并保持活动状态。

contents.text: If the local system receives a Tcp_CR_Invalid event (Event 15), the local system rejects the TCP connection and stays in the Active State.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统接收到Tcp_CR_无效事件（事件15），本地系统将拒绝Tcp连接并保持活动状态。

contents.text: In response to the success of a TCP connection (Event 16 or Event 17), the local system checks the DelayOpen optional attribute prior to processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了响应TCP连接成功（事件16或事件17），本地系统在处理之前检查DelayOpen可选属性。

contents.text: If the DelayOpen attribute is set to TRUE, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DelayOpen属性设置为TRUE，则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - sets the DelayOpenTimer to the initial value (DelayOpenTime), and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将DelayOpenTimer设置为初始值（DelayOpenTime），然后

contents.text: - stays in the Active state.
contents.zh-CHS: - 保持活动状态。

contents.text: If the DelayOpen attribute is set to FALSE, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DelayOpen属性设置为FALSE，则本地系统：

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - completes the BGP initialization,
contents.zh-CHS: - 完成BGP初始化，

contents.text: - sends the OPEN message to its peer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将打开的消息发送给其对等方，

contents.text: - sets its HoldTimer to a large value, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其HoldTimer设置为较大的值，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to OpenSent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为OpenSent。

contents.text: A HoldTimer value of 4 minutes is suggested as a "large value" for the HoldTimer.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议将4分钟的HoldTimer值作为HoldTimer的“大值”。

contents.text: If the local system receives a TcpConnectionFails event (Event 18), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统接收到TcpConnectionFails事件（事件18），则本地系统：

contents.text: - restarts the ConnectRetryTimer (with the initial value),
contents.zh-CHS: - 重新启动ConnectRetryTimer（使用初始值），

contents.text: - stops and clears the DelayOpenTimer (sets the value to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止并清除DelayOpenTimer（将值设置为零），

contents.text: - releases all BGP resource,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - optionally performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则可以选择执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If an OPEN message is received and the DelayOpenTimer is running (Event 20), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到打开消息且DelayOpenTimer正在运行（事件20），则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer (if running) and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer（如果正在运行）并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - stops and clears the DelayOpenTimer (sets to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止并清除DelayOpenTimer（设置为零），

contents.text: - completes the BGP initialization,
contents.zh-CHS: - 完成BGP初始化，

contents.text: - sends an OPEN message,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送一条公开消息，

contents.text: - sends a KEEPALIVE message,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送一条KEEPALIVE消息，

contents.text: - if the HoldTimer value is non-zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果HoldTimer值为非零，

contents.text: - starts the KeepaliveTimer to initial value,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将KeepaliveTimer启动为初始值，

contents.text: - resets the HoldTimer to the negotiated value,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将HoldTimer重置为协商值，

contents.text: else if the HoldTimer is zero
contents.zh-CHS: 否则，如果保持计时器为零

contents.text: - resets the KeepaliveTimer (set to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 重置KeepaliveTimer（设置为零），

contents.text: - resets the HoldTimer to zero, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将HoldTimer重置为零，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to OpenConfirm.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为OpenConfirm。

contents.text: If the value of the autonomous system field is the same as the local Autonomous System number, set the connection status to an internal connection; otherwise it will be external.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果自治系统字段的值与本地自治系统编号相同，则将连接状态设置为内部连接；否则它将是外部的。

contents.text: If BGP message header checking (Event 21) or OPEN message checking detects an error (Event 22) (see Section 6.2), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果BGP消息头检查（事件21）或打开消息检查检测到错误（事件22）（参见第6.2节），本地系统：

contents.text: - (optionally) sends a NOTIFICATION message with the appropriate error code if the SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN attribute is set to TRUE,
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果SendNOTIFICATIONwithoutOPEN属性设置为TRUE，则发送带有相应错误代码的通知消息，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If a NOTIFICATION message is received with a version error (Event 24), the local system checks the DelayOpenTimer. If the DelayOpenTimer is running, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到带有版本错误的通知消息（事件24），本地系统将检查DelayOpenTimer。如果DelayOpenTimer正在运行，则本地系统：

contents.text: - stops the ConnectRetryTimer (if running) and sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止ConnectRetryTimer（如果正在运行）并将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - stops and resets the DelayOpenTimer (sets to zero),
contents.zh-CHS: - 停止并重置DelayOpenTimer（设置为零），

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the DelayOpenTimer is not running, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果DelayOpenTimer未运行，则本地系统：

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: In response to any other event (Events 8, 10-11, 13, 19, 23, 25-28), the local system:
- sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by one,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: OpenSent:
contents.zh-CHS: OpenSent：

contents.text: In this state, BGP FSM waits for an OPEN message from its peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此状态下，BGP FSM等待来自其对等方的打开消息。

contents.text: The start events (Events 1, 3-7) are ignored in the OpenSent state.
contents.zh-CHS: 在OpenSent状态下忽略启动事件（事件1、3-7）。

contents.text: If a ManualStop event (Event 2) is issued in the OpenSent state, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在OpenSent状态下发出手动停止事件（事件2），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sends the NOTIFICATION with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryCounter to zero, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter设置为零，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If an AutomaticStop event (Event 8) is issued in the OpenSent state, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在OpenSent状态下发出AutomaticStop事件（事件8），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sends the NOTIFICATION with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all the BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the HoldTimer_Expires (Event 10), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果HoldTimer_过期（事件10），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION message with the error code Hold Timer Expired,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送错误代码Hold Timer已过期的通知消息，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter,
contents.zh-CHS: - 递增ConnectRetryCounter，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If a TcpConnection_Valid (Event 14), Tcp_CR_Acked (Event 16), or a TcpConnectionConfirmed event (Event 17) is received, a second TCP connection may be in progress. This second TCP connection is tracked per Connection Collision processing (Section 6.8) until an OPEN message is received.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到Tcp连接有效（事件14）、Tcp连接确认（事件16）或Tcp连接确认事件（事件17），则第二个Tcp连接可能正在进行。每次连接冲突处理（第6.8节）都会跟踪第二个TCP连接，直到收到打开的消息。

contents.text: A TCP Connection Request for an Invalid port (Tcp_CR_Invalid (Event 15)) is ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 对无效端口的TCP连接请求（TCP_CR_Invalid（事件15））被忽略。

contents.text: If a TcpConnectionFails event (Event 18) is received, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到TcpConnectionFails事件（事件18），则本地系统：

contents.text: - closes the BGP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 关闭BGP连接，

contents.text: - restarts the ConnectRetryTimer,
contents.zh-CHS: - 重新启动ConnectRetryTimer，

contents.text: - continues to listen for a connection that may be initiated by the remote BGP peer, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 继续侦听远程BGP对等方可能发起的连接，以及

contents.text: - changes its state to Active.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为“活动”。

contents.text: When an OPEN message is received, all fields are checked for correctness. If there are no errors in the OPEN message (Event 19), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到打开的消息时，将检查所有字段的正确性。如果打开消息（事件19）中没有错误，则本地系统：

contents.text: - resets the DelayOpenTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将DelayOpenTimer重置为零，

contents.text: - sets the BGP ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将BGP ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - sends a KEEPALIVE message, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送一条KEEPALIVE消息，然后

contents.text: - sets a KeepaliveTimer (via the text below)
contents.zh-CHS: - 设置KeepaliveTimer（通过下面的文本）

contents.text: - sets the HoldTimer according to the negotiated value (see Section 4.2),
contents.zh-CHS: - 根据协商值设置HoldTimer（参见第4.2节），

contents.text: - changes its state to OpenConfirm.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为OpenConfirm。

contents.text: If the negotiated hold time value is zero, then the HoldTimer and KeepaliveTimer are not started. If the value of the Autonomous System field is the same as the local Autonomous System number, then the connection is an "internal" connection; otherwise, it is an "external" connection. (This will impact UPDATE processing as described below.)
contents.zh-CHS: 如果协商的保持时间值为零，则不会启动保持计时器和KeepaliveTimer。如果自治系统字段的值与本地自治系统编号相同，则连接为“内部”连接；否则，它是一个“外部”连接。（这将影响如下所述的更新处理。）

contents.text: If the BGP message header checking (Event 21) or OPEN message checking detects an error (Event 22)(see Section 6.2), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果BGP消息头检查（事件21）或打开消息检查检测到错误（事件22）（参见第6.2节），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION message with the appropriate error code,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有相应错误代码的通知消息，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: Collision detection mechanisms (Section 6.8) need to be applied when a valid BGP OPEN message is received (Event 19 or Event 20). Please refer to Section 6.8 for the details of the comparison. A
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到有效的BGP OPEN消息（事件19或事件20）时，需要应用碰撞检测机制（第6.8节）。有关比较的详细信息，请参阅第6.8节。A.

contents.text: CollisionDetectDump event occurs when the BGP implementation determines, by means outside the scope of this document, that a connection collision has occurred.
contents.zh-CHS: 当BGP实现通过本文档范围之外的方式确定发生了连接冲突时，将发生CollisionDetectDump事件。

contents.text: If a connection in the OpenSent state is determined to be the connection that must be closed, an OpenCollisionDump (Event 23) is signaled to the state machine. If such an event is received in the OpenSent state, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果确定处于OpenSent状态的连接是必须关闭的连接，则会向状态机发送OpenCollisionDump（事件23）信号。如果在OpenSent状态下收到此类事件，则本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If a NOTIFICATION message is received with a version error (Event 24), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到带有版本错误的通知消息（事件24），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: In response to any other event (Events 9, 11-13, 20, 25-28), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应任何其他事件（事件9、11-13、20、25-28），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends the NOTIFICATION with the Error Code Finite State Machine Error,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送错误代码为有限状态机错误的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: OpenConfirm State:
contents.zh-CHS: OpenConfirm状态：

contents.text: In this state, BGP waits for a KEEPALIVE or NOTIFICATION message.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此状态下，BGP等待KEEPALIVE或通知消息。

contents.text: Any start event (Events 1, 3-7) is ignored in the OpenConfirm state.
contents.zh-CHS: 在OpenConfirm状态下忽略任何启动事件（事件1、3-7）。

contents.text: In response to a ManualStop event (Event 2) initiated by the operator, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应操作员启动的手动停止事件（事件2），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends the NOTIFICATION message with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知消息，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryCounter to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter设置为零，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: In response to the AutomaticStop event initiated by the system (Event 8), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应系统启动的AutomaticStop事件（事件8），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends the NOTIFICATION message with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知消息，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the HoldTimer_Expires event (Event 10) occurs before a KEEPALIVE message is received, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在收到KEEPALIVE消息之前发生HoldTimer_Expires事件（事件10），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sends the NOTIFICATION message with the Error Code Hold Timer Expired,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送错误代码保持计时器过期的通知消息，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the local system receives a KeepaliveTimer_Expires event (Event 11), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统收到KeepaliveTimer_Expires事件（事件11），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a KEEPALIVE message,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送一条KEEPALIVE消息，

contents.text: - restarts the KeepaliveTimer, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 重新启动KeepaliveTimer，然后

contents.text: - remains in the OpenConfirmed state.
contents.zh-CHS: - 仍处于打开确认状态。

contents.text: In the event of a TcpConnection_Valid event (Event 14), or the success of a TCP connection (Event 16 or Event 17) while in OpenConfirm, the local system needs to track the second connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在OpenConfirm中发生TcpConnection_有效事件（事件14）或TCP连接成功（事件16或事件17），则本地系统需要跟踪第二个连接。

contents.text: If a TCP connection is attempted with an invalid port (Event 15), the local system will ignore the second connection attempt.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果尝试使用无效端口进行TCP连接（事件15），本地系统将忽略第二次连接尝试。

contents.text: If the local system receives a TcpConnectionFails event (Event 18) from the underlying TCP or a NOTIFICATION message (Event 25), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统从底层TCP接收到TcpConnectionFails事件（事件18）或通知消息（事件25），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the local system receives a NOTIFICATION message with a version error (NotifMsgVerErr (Event 24)), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统收到带有版本错误的通知消息（NotIFMSGVERRR（事件24）），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the local system receives a valid OPEN message (BGPOpen (Event 19)), the collision detect function is processed per Section 6.8. If this connection is to be dropped due to connection collision, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统收到有效的打开消息（BGPOpen（事件19）），则按照第6.8节处理碰撞检测功能。如果由于连接冲突要断开此连接，本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection (send TCP FIN),
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接（发送TCP FIN），

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If an OPEN message is received, all fields are checked for correctness. If the BGP message header checking (BGPHeaderErr (Event 21)) or OPEN message checking detects an error (see Section 6.2) (BGPOpenMsgErr (Event 22)), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到打开的消息，将检查所有字段的正确性。如果BGP消息头检查（BGPHEADERRER（事件21））或打开消息检查检测到错误（请参阅第6.2节）（BGPOpenMsgErr（事件22）），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION message with the appropriate error code,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有相应错误代码的通知消息，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If, during the processing of another OPEN message, the BGP implementation determines, by a means outside the scope of this document, that a connection collision has occurred and this connection is to be closed, the local system will issue an OpenCollisionDump event (Event 23). When the local system receives an OpenCollisionDump event (Event 23), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果在处理另一条打开的消息期间，BGP实现通过本文档范围之外的方式确定发生了连接冲突，并且该连接将被关闭，则本地系统将发出OpenCollisionDump事件（事件23）。当本地系统接收到OpenCollisionDump事件（事件23）时，本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the local system receives a KEEPALIVE message (KeepAliveMsg (Event 26)), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果本地系统收到KEEPALIVE消息（KeepAliveMsg（事件26）），则本地系统：

contents.text: - restarts the HoldTimer and
contents.zh-CHS: - 重新启动HoldTimer并

contents.text: - changes its state to Established.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为“已建立”。

contents.text: In response to any other event (Events 9, 12-13, 20, 27-28), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应任何其他事件（事件9、12-13、20、27-28），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION with a code of Finite State Machine Error,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有有限状态机错误代码的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: Established State:
contents.zh-CHS: 既定国家：

contents.text: In the Established state, the BGP FSM can exchange UPDATE, NOTIFICATION, and KEEPALIVE messages with its peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 在已建立状态下，BGP FSM可以与其对等方交换更新、通知和保留消息。

contents.text: Any Start event (Events 1, 3-7) is ignored in the Established state.
contents.zh-CHS: 在已建立状态下，忽略任何启动事件（事件1、3-7）。

contents.text: In response to a ManualStop event (initiated by an operator) (Event 2), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应手动停止事件（由操作员启动）（事件2），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends the NOTIFICATION message with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知消息，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - deletes all routes associated with this connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 删除与此连接关联的所有路由，

contents.text: - releases BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryCounter to zero, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter设置为零，然后

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: In response to an AutomaticStop event (Event 8), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 为响应AutomaticStop事件（事件8），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零

contents.text: - deletes all routes associated with this connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 删除与此连接关联的所有路由，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: One reason for an AutomaticStop event is: A BGP receives an UPDATE messages with a number of prefixes for a given peer such that the total prefixes received exceeds the maximum number of prefixes configured. The local system automatically disconnects the peer.
contents.zh-CHS: AutomaticStop事件的一个原因是：BGP接收到具有给定对等方前缀数量的更新消息，因此接收到的前缀总数超过了配置的最大前缀数量。本地系统会自动断开对等机的连接。

contents.text: If the HoldTimer_Expires event occurs (Event 10), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果发生HoldTimer_Expires事件（事件10），本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION message with the Error Code Hold Timer Expired,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送错误代码Hold Timer已过期的通知消息，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，

contents.text: - drops the TCP connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 断开TCP连接，

contents.text: - increments the ConnectRetryCounter by 1,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryCounter增加1，

contents.text: - (optionally) performs peer oscillation damping if the DampPeerOscillations attribute is set to TRUE, and
contents.zh-CHS: - （可选）如果DampPeerOscillations属性设置为TRUE，则执行对等振荡阻尼，并且

contents.text: - changes its state to Idle.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将其状态更改为空闲。

contents.text: If the KeepaliveTimer_Expires event occurs (Event 11), the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果发生KeepaliveTimer_Expires事件（事件11），则本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a KEEPALIVE message, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送一条KEEPALIVE消息，然后

contents.text: - restarts its KeepaliveTimer, unless the negotiated HoldTime value is zero.
contents.zh-CHS: - 重新启动其KeepaliveTimer，除非协商的HoldTime值为零。

contents.text: Each time the local system sends a KEEPALIVE or UPDATE message, it restarts its KeepaliveTimer, unless the negotiated HoldTime value is zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 每次本地系统发送KEEPALIVE或UPDATE消息时，它都会重新启动其KeepaliveTimer，除非协商的HoldTime值为零。

contents.text: A TcpConnection_Valid (Event 14), received for a valid port, will cause the second connection to be tracked.
contents.zh-CHS: 为有效端口接收的TcpConnection_Valid（事件14）将导致跟踪第二个连接。

contents.text: An invalid TCP connection (Tcp_CR_Invalid event (Event 15)) will be ignored.
contents.zh-CHS: 无效的TCP连接（TCP\u CR\u无效事件（事件15））将被忽略。

contents.text: In response to an indication that the TCP connection is successfully established (Event 16 or Event 17), the second connection SHALL be tracked until it sends an OPEN message.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了响应TCP连接成功建立的指示（事件16或事件17），应跟踪第二个连接，直到其发送打开消息。

contents.text: If a valid OPEN message (BGPOpen (Event 19)) is received, and if the CollisionDetectEstablishedState optional attribute is TRUE, the OPEN message will be checked to see if it collides (Section 6.8) with any other connection. If the BGP implementation determines that this connection needs to be terminated, it will process an OpenCollisionDump event (Event 23). If this connection needs to be terminated, the local system:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果收到有效的打开消息（BGPOpen（事件19）），并且如果CollisionDetectedTestAblishedState可选属性为TRUE，则将检查打开的消息是否与任何其他连接发生冲突（第6.8节）。如果BGP实现确定需要终止此连接，它将处理OpenCollisionDump事件（事件23）。如果需要终止此连接，本地系统：

contents.text: - sends a NOTIFICATION with a Cease,
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送带有停止的通知，

contents.text: - sets the ConnectRetryTimer to zero,
contents.zh-CHS: - 将ConnectRetryTimer设置为零，

contents.text: - deletes all routes associated with this connection,
contents.zh-CHS: - 删除与此连接关联的所有路由，

contents.text: - releases all BGP resources,
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放所有BGP资源，
